title: Sanctions for contravention of sections 169A to 169C.
content: 169D. Any distribution made in contravention of sections 169A and 169C must be returned by the shareholders who received it, if the company proves that the said shareholders- 151 26 of 70 (I) of 2003. (a) were aware of the irregularity of the distributions made in their favour; or (b) could not in view of the circumstances have been unaware of it. Interpretation provision. 26 of 70(I) of 2003.
